text: John Charles Haines (May 26, 1818 - July 4, 1896) served as mayor of Chicago, Illinois (1858â€“1860) for the Democratic Party. Haines was born on May 26, 1818 in Deerfield, New York. Haines died on July 4, 1896 in Waukegan, Illinois, aged 78. ==References== ==Other websites== *Inaugural Address *Inaugural Address Category:1818 births Category:1896 deaths Category:Mayors of Chicago Category:Burials at Rosehill Cemetery Category:Politicians from New York (state) Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Waukegan, Illinois
